page.title: 12Local Employment
page.content: In this area there are quite lot of small farms but they do not provide a lot of work for people other than the farmer and his own family.Many people work in shops in Truro,Redruth and Camborne.There are a few small factories around here such as C.A.W. which makes windows and employs about 50 people.A lot of people are unemployed,about 18%. Lots of people make some money in the holiday season by taking in holidaymakers in one of their spare rooms.They charge about Â£6 for bed and breakfast for each person. Wages are not very high in this area,for example a man who works for C.A.W.making windows might take home Â£80-Â£90 which is not a lot and an ancillary assistant in a school earns less than Â£2 an hour.
